alert.note: Alert for Bannock; Bingham; Blaine; Bonneville; Butte; Caribou; Cassia; Clark; Custer; Jefferson; Power (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 5:59PM MDT until May 02 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Custer County in central Idaho... Southeastern Blaine County in central Idaho... Northwestern Caribou County in southeastern Idaho... Jefferson County in southeastern Idaho... Northern Bannock County in southeastern Idaho... Butte County in southeastern Idaho... Power County in southeastern Idaho... Northwestern Bonneville County in southeastern Idaho... Southwestern Clark County in southeastern Idaho... Northeastern Cassia County in southeastern Idaho... Bingham County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 645 PM MDT. * At 559 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Northwest Inl to near Pingree to near Fort Hall Bannock Peak, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Idaho Falls, Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Arco, Neeley, Goshen, American Falls Reservoir, Terreton, Chubbuck, Shelley, Aberdeen, Inkom, Roberts, Firth, Mud Lake, Rockland, Atomic City, Southeast Inl and Pingree. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bannock; Bingham; Blaine; Bonneville; Butte; Caribou; Cassia; Clark; Custer; Jefferson; Power
